sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' export class NewsItem extends Component { render() {let {title,description,img,url,date,author,source}=this.props return (
${source} unread messages
{title}...

{description}...

Read more

Posted on {new Date(date).toGMTString()} by {author?author:"unknown"}

) } } export default NewsItem
